p: DENV1-4 and ZIKV were cultured in 2x10 5 HuH7 and Vero cells, respectively, for 48 h or until cytopathic effects were observed. CHIKV was cultured in 2x10 5 BHK21 cells for 20 h. After incubation, supernatant was removed and cell layers were scrapped into 250 Î¼l of sterile PBS. RNA from serum and urine samples were extracted directly. All viral cultures and clinical samples were handled in a Class II-A2 biosafety cabinet under BSL-2 conditions according to national regulations pertaining to the handling of infectious agents.
